content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 54, "index": 18}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "magma_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 46, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a stone sword, I need to place 2 blackstone blocks in the first 2 slots of the crafting grid and a stick in the middle slot of the last row. Therefore, I will first move one of the two blackstone blocks in my inventory from slot 35 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 54, "index": 18}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "magma_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 46, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 45}]
thought: I now need to move the other blackstone block to the second slot of the crafting grid, which is slot 4.
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 54, "index": 18}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "magma_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 46, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 45}]
thought: I now need to move the stick to the middle slot of the last row of the crafting grid, which is slot 7.
act: move from slot 41 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stone_sword
inventory=[{"type": "stone_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 54, "index": 18}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "magma_block", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 46, "index": 43}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the sword has been crafted, I can move it from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
